tilemap_tileset: Using this function you can change the tile set resource assigned to a given tile map element on a layer. You give the tile map element ID (which you get when you create a tile map element using layer_tilemap_create() or when you use the function layer_tilemap_get_id()), and then supply a tile set index and the tile map will be given the new sprite.
The unique ID value of the tile map element to change
The new tile set index to use

{ANY_CODE} var lay_id = layer_get_id("Tiles_trees");
var tile_id = layer_tilemap_get_id(lay_id);
if tilemap_get_tileset(tile_id) != ts_Nighttime
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}tilemap_tileset(tile_id, ts_Nighttime);
{nbsp_x4}}
The above code checks the current tile set assigned to the tile map on the layer "Tiles_trees" and if it is not "ts_Nighttime" then that tile set is assigned to the tile map.
